paragraph: Masashi Goda (合田 雅吏, Gōda Masashi) (born 9 January 1970) is a Japanese actor from Kanagawa Prefecture. He is best known for his portrayal of Yuuji Mita/OHBlue in Chōriki Sentai Ohranger. In 2009, he joined the cast of Samurai Sentai Shinkenger in the recurring role of Shiba Retsudō, the first Shinken Red.
Samurai Sentai Shinkenger the Movie: The Fateful War (2009), Shiba Retsudō
